thread.title: Tricia Alcindor

author: Tricia Alcindor
title: Tricia Alcindor
text: It has been 5 days now I have been trying to get a response on my order. Already I cannot get refunded because of their ever strict rather insensitive store policies. No one is responding to my emails nor my calls and my card has long been charged for the items. Whatever you do, DO NOT BUY FROM THIS STORE. SAVE YOURSELF. I HATE THIS SITE. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS. I have discouraged everyone I know from being treated the way I have been treated.
